E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1990
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The fans are not happy that you let Vince Coleman go.
The overall fan interest decreases noticeably.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Monday, 2/6/1990
Subject: Contract offer
FYI- Toronto has offered me a better contract!
They offer a BIG amount of money!

Regards,
Vince Coleman



Date: Monday, 2/6/1990
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Spike Owen



Date: Wednesday, 2/8/1990
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Toronto has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Vince Coleman



Date: Wednesday, 2/8/1990
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with St. Louis!

Regards,
Spike Owen

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Geronimo Pena
Dear Sir,
Geronimo Pena has an AVG of .164 at AA Arkansas Travelers!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/4/1990
Subject: Status of Tom Lampkin
Dear Sir,
Tom Lampkin isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Arkansas Travelers!
He has an AVG of .231, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
